Sampler, 1802.
1802. Medium: silk and cotton embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, knot, cross, threaded running, back, cross, and buttonhole stitches with needlelace on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-257.
